name: Price of Glory
description: A father whose boxing career was derailed channels his love of the sport into coaching his three sons - but when an outside manager offers to take over, the family threatens to split in this hard-hitting drama.

review.author: denthegod
review.heading: Dramatic family film.
review.reviewBody: I was lucky enough to catch this in the theatres twice. It's a great boxing film that not only deals with the glamours of boxing but also with the dark business side of it. When it was first released it was underrated and poorly promoted. Definitely worth a rental. Touching storyline and great action sequences.

keywords: family relationships,father,boxing,loss of dream,brother brother relationship
